Notification

We have great news for you!

Your employee, ${firstName} ${lastName}, has received an HPE Recognition ${cashEarnings} cash award for ${category}.

This award was established to recognize individuals whose behaviors and accomplishments strengthen the HPE Culture. We encourage you to take time to personally congratulate your employee for receiving this significant award. Ensure you understand the employee's preference for private or public recognition and share this great news that best fits their desires.

MyRecognition @hpe Program Team

HPE Recognition, a MyRecognition @hpe program, provides a way for organizations to recognize employees with a cash award. The recipient's cash award of ${cashEarnings} will be added to an upcoming paycheck. In countries with monthly pay cycles, the award will appear within two pay periods. In countries with semi-monthly or weekly payment cycles, the award will appear within three pay periods.

Note that any required taxes are withheld from the employee's earnings statement according to local tax laws.

HPE Recognition levels are noted below. Your local value can be found on the Recognition Country Pages: Level 1: Bronze; Level 2: Silver; Level 3: Gold.

Want to print HPE Recognition Certificates? Visit MyRecognition @hpe portal > Resource Center > Downloads.

Need additional information? To learn more about HPE's recognition programs, please visit MyRecognition @hpe > Resource Center.

Want to recognize others? To recognize a colleague or manager, view recognitions you have given or received, or redeem an award, visit your personalized MyRecognition @hpe webpage.
